column5: just found this out  we can get a 8% refund for the past 4 years  here is a link to explain more  http://www.timminspress.com/ArticleDisplay...=Brandon+Walker  here is the link to the tax form  http://www.rev.gov.on.ca/english/forms/rst/pdf/0298.pdf   I just filled out mine and I should get $74  minus the stamp of course LOL!!!
Thanks, I just printed my form off and will call my insurance company tomorrow.
Thanks for the info. I'm going to check it out as well.
